alert.note: Alert for East Glacier Park Region (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 25 at 6:09PM MST until November 26 at 8:00AM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM MST SATURDAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM SATURDAY TO 8 AM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...For the first Winter Weather Advisory, snow. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches tonight. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. For the second Winter Weather Advisory, snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 1 and 3 inches at lower elevations and 4 to 9 inches in the mountains. Winds gusting as high as 60 mph. * WHERE...East Glacier Park Region. * WHEN...For the first Winter Weather Advisory, until 8 AM MST Saturday. For the second Winter Weather Advisory, from 10 PM Saturday to 8 AM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website.
